import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; // import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; /* This example requires some changes to your config: ``` // tailwind.config.js module.exports = { // ... plugins: [ // ... require('@tailwindcss/forms'), ], } ``` */ export default function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const handleLogin = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // 发送请求到你的服务器以验证登录信息 const response = await axios.post("http://localhost:3000/login", { email, password, }); console.log("Login response:", response); // 处理登录成功的情况（例如跳转到主页） } catch (error) { console.error("Login error:", error); // 处理登录失败的情况（例如显示错误消息） } }; return ( <> {/* This example requires updating your template: ``` ``` */}
